abilities.name: Emperor’s Eyes
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent’s Basic Pokémon in play have no Abilities, except for Pokémon with a Rule Box (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes).

attacks.name: Swirling Slice
attacks.effect: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
